metadata.title: CVE-2024-29508 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.0 has a heap-based pointer disclosure(observable in a constructed BaseFont name) in the functionpdf_base_font_alloc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-29508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.13
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.13
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.13
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.13').
